subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Stephen Curry scored 40 points, including 30 in the second half, to carry the No. 10 seed Davidson to a come-from-behind, 82-76 upset of No. 7 Gonzaga.
snippet: Stephen Curry scored 40 points, including 30 in the second half, to carry the No. 10 seed Davidson to a come-from-behind, 82-76 upset of No. 7 Gonzaga.
